mapper.select: SELECT mem_pass FROM member WHERE mem_id = #{memId}
SELECT mem_status FROM member WHERE mem_id = #{memId}
SELECT jumin_back FROM member WHERE mem_id = #{memId}

SELECT m.mem_id, m.mem_name, m.mem_email, m.mem_private_email AS privateEmail, m.mem_phone, d.dept_name, r.rank_name, m.mem_status, m.mem_hiredate, m.mem_gender, m.jumin_front, m.jumin_back, m.mem_address, CONCAT(a.file_path, '/', a.saved_name) AS memPicture FROM member m LEFT JOIN dept d ON m.dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN rank r ON m.rank_id = r.rank_id LEFT JOIN attachment a ON a.business_id = m.mem_id AND a.attach_type = 'P' WHERE m.mem_id = #{memId}
SELECT an_id, mem_id, year, total_days, use_days, remain_days FROM annual_leave WHERE mem_id = #{memId} ORDER BY year DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT ah.start_date, ah.end_date, ah.leave_code, lt.leave_name, ah.approved_by, m.mem_name FROM annual_leave_history ah LEFT JOIN leave_type lt ON ah.leave_code = lt.leave_code LEFT JOIN member m ON ah.approved_by = m.mem_id WHERE ah.mem_id = #{memId} ORDER BY ah.start_date DESC
SELECT dept_id, dept_name FROM dept WHERE use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY dept_id
SELECT rank_id, rank_name FROM rank WHERE use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY rank_id
SELECT LPAD(IFNULL(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(mem_id, 9, 4) AS UNSIGNED)), 0) + 1, 4, '0') FROM member WHERE mem_id LIKE CONCAT('LDB', #{year}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (mem_id, mem_pass, mem_email, mem_private_email, mem_name, mem_gender, mem_phone, jumin_front, jumin_back, mem_address, mem_status, mem_hiredate, dept_id, rank_id, created_by, created_at) VALUES (#{memId}, #{memPass}, #{memEmail}, #{memPrivateEmail}, #{memName}, #{memGender}, #{memPhone}, #{juminFront}, #{juminBack}, #{memAddress}, #{memStatus}, #{memHiredate}, #{deptId}, #{rankId}, #{createdBy}, #{createdAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET dept_id = #{deptId}, rank_id = #{rankId} WHERE mem_id = #{memId}
UPDATE member SET mem_pass = #{encodedPassword} WHERE mem_id = #{memId}
